TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebRequestEvent extends System.Web.Management.WebManagementEvent

summary.span: 为提供 Web 请求信息的事件定义基类。

span.span: Defines the base class for events providing Web-request information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在每个 Web 请求时引发。The is raised at every Web request. 它使用类来获取请求信息。It uses the class to obtain request information. > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下将使用标准 ASP.NET 运行状况监视类型，并通过设置来控制其行为`healthMonitoring`配置节。In most cases you will use the standard ASP.NET health-monitoring types and control their behavior by setting the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 下一个示例中所示，你还可以创建自定义类型。You can also create custom types, as shown in the next example. 如果你创建自定义事件类型，你需要添加您自己的信息，请自定义方法。If you create your custom event type and you need to add your own information, customize the method. 这将避免覆盖或篡改敏感的系统信息。This will avoid overwriting or tampering with sensitive system information. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从派生类，以创建自定义事件。The following code example shows how to derive from the class to create a custom event. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebRequestEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebRequestEvent/CS/WebRequestEvent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebRequestEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.WebRequestEvent/VB/WebRequestEvent.vb#1)] 下面是使 ASP.NET 可以使用自定义事件的配置文件的摘录。The following is an excerpt of the configuration file that enables ASP.NET to use the custom event. ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RequestInformation As WebRequestInformation

summary.span: 获取与 Web 应用程序请求关联的信息。

span.span: Gets the information associated with the Web-application request.

value.span: 与 Web 应用程序请求关联的信息。

span.span: The information associated with the Web-application request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过定义标准请求信息类。The standard request information is defined by the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取 Web 请求信息。The following code example shows how to obtain the Web-request information.
